tool.name: Primer Clipper
tool.description: Clip primer sequences from a BAM file based on locations of these sequences at defined in an extended BED file.
tool.command: ln -f -s "${bamfile}" input.bam && picard SortSam I=input.bam O=input_sorted.sam SO=queryname && uniq input_sorted.sam input_sorted_uniq.sam && python $__tool_directory__/primer_clip.py --bed "${input_bed}" --bamfile input_sorted_uniq.sam --outfile "${outfile}"

param.name: bamfile
param.label: Input BAM
param.help: BAM file that will lose the primer sequences.

data.name: outfile
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Output BAM
data.help: Output in BAM format, primer sequences have been clipped.

tool.help: Clip primer sequences from a BAM file based on locations of these sequences at defined in an extended BED file.
